title: Japanese doll
brief_description: Describes the historical development of doll-making in Japan with a rich and colorful display of dolls of various designs. Also introduces the unique techniques of doll-making by one of Japan’s contemporary master artists.
description: Describes the historical development of doll-making in Japan with a rich and colorful display of dolls of various designs. Also introduces the unique techniques of doll-making by one of Japan’s contemporary master artists.
